title: Cathie Wood's ARK Invest Sold Nearly $150M Coinbase Shares Last Week
description: ARK Invest aims to have no individual holding surpass a 10% weighting of an ETF's value, making such large sell offs necessary when an asset surges in value.

title: Bitcoin rockets above $71,000, surpasses silver in market cap
description: BTC has soared past the $71,000 mark, achieving a new all-time high and surpassing silver with a market cap nearing $1.4 trillion.

title: BTC Breaks $70K: Morgan Creek Digital Co-Founder Jason Williams Sees Start of Bitcoin Price Discovery Era
description: Around 7:15 a.m. UTC on Monday, 11 March 2024, the Bitcoin price broke the $70,000 level for the first time, before continuing its rally past $71,000. At the time of writing (9:03 a.m. UTC) on crypto nexchange Bitstamp, Bitcoin is trading at around $71,198, up 1.87% in the past 24-hour period. Jason Williams is known […]

title: Vitalik Buterin outlines Ethereum’s countermeasures for quantum attacks
description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has recently addressed concerns over the potential impact of quantum computing on the Ethereum (ETH) network. In a post dated March 9 to Ethereum Research, Buterin presented a scenario where quantum computers become accessible and could…

title: Korean tax service mulling new platform to monitor all crypto transactions
description: Korea’s National Tax Service wants to develop a new management system to monitor crypto transactions and combat illegal activities, targeting completion by 2025. South Korea‘s National Tax Service has initiated preliminary consultations with a consulting firm to develop a new…

title: Ethereum Challenger Poised for 600% Surge, Bitcoin Approaching Endgame: Trader’s Forecast
description: One analyst believes Solana is poised for a surge to $500; its next resistance at $174 and then $202, and if it breaks past these, a new all-time high could be on the cards. The analyst says that Bitcoin will slow down after hitting its new all-time high and could dip to $62,000 in the [...]

title: Top Runes Projects to Know — Part 2
description:

title: Billionaire Bill Ackman Says Bitcoin Could Skyrocket ‘To Infinity’ in Economic Collapse Scenario
description:
Billionaire Bill Ackman says that Bitcoin’s (BTC) potential could be limitless in the case of an economic collapse. In a new thread on the social media platform X, the chief executive of hedge fund Pershing Square Capital Management says that the crypto king could create an endless loop that sees its price go up infinitely. […]

The post Billionaire Bill Ackman Says Bitcoin Could Skyrocket ‘To Infinity’ in Economic Collapse Scenario appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
